name: Lucky Boom
overview:
Lucky Boom is an action game developed and published by Playmark for Arcades.

In Lucky Boom players control a guy that can move left or right on a single screen. Red balls will bounce around the screen and will kill the player if touched.

Players can shoot a projectile straight up to the top of the screen, with a rope attached to it. If the balls touch the projectile or rope they will break into a smaller ball. Once the balls have been broken down a set amount they can then be destroyed.

The game ends after a set time limit with players trying to reach a high score.
